column4: hi .. does webcam work in flash player in ubuntu 10.04 ??? It works otherwise but not in flash .. Any ideas ???
hi .. my webcam doesnt work on flash .. any help please ? but i am able to use webcam on empathy video call ?
yes... over XMPP
Need it to work on flash .. Just wanted to show that drivers are properly installed.. ubuntu s detected my webcam .. but flash is not showing up anything ..
search google "flash player control center" or something like that
and allow the URLs you want, on the webcam tab
sure ..
: did i miss any of your chats/questions ?
, no you just said "sure" and i asked why you said that, and you replied "yes Beyecixramd" so i'm feeling a bit lost now
you need to wrap the 32 bit version
wrap the 32 bit version  .. how do I do that please ?
How do i wrap the 32 bit version  Flash  ?
oh sorry, wait a second please
sure no problem ..
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1329337
pLr: okay thanks ..
pLr: ohh libflashplayer is a buggy one ... isnt it ?
hmmm why?
im using Gnash, tho, and working perfectly (at least for ut00b)
okay .. I ll use that ..
gnash is the FLOSS counterpart to flash... i don't recommend it unless you REALLY love open source, it's a bit buggy sometimes
thanks for sharing that ..
yes, and still being developed
